    • Method Detail

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(AndroidL8ManagerListener listener)
        Registers listeners
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener that will receive events like L8 connection status and so on.

      • unregisterListener

        public void unregisterListener(AndroidL8ManagerListener listener)
        Unregisters listeners
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to be removed from manager. You have to unregister a listener if it is not available any more.

      • init

        public void init(Activity activity)
        Initializes the current instance of AndroidL8Manager
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity is necessary to launch device list activity.

      • init

        public void init()
        Initializes the current instance of AndroidL8Manager. In the case of using l8 SDK from a service you have to call this method instead of init(activity).

      • scan

        public void scan(Activity activity)
        Starts a new scan.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity is necessary to launch device list activity.

        Returns true if a device is connected.
        Parameters:

        true if a device is connected.

      • getConnectedDeviceList

        public java.util.ArrayList<L8> getConnectedDeviceList()
        Returns a l8 devices list with all connected devices.
        Returns:
        l8 device list

      • removeRegisteredDevices

        public void removeRegisteredDevices()
        Removes all registered devices. It is a very useful method to clean device list and reduce the initial connection time.

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Releases resources and close all connections. You have to call this method when you close your app.

      • isDestroyed

        public boolean isDestroyed()
        Checks if AndroidL8manager has been destroyed.
        Returns:
        true if AndroidL8manager has been destroyed

      • setMatrix

        public void setMatrix(java.lang.String image)
               throws L8Exception
        Sets a l8 image with text format.
        Parameters:
        image - Image in text format. for example: this is the Bluetooth symbol "#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#ffffff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#ffffff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#ffffff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#0000ff-#000000"
        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.

      • setMatrix

        public void setMatrix(Color[][] colorMatrix)
               throws L8Exception
        Sets a l8 image from a color matrix.
        Parameters:
        colorMatrix - Color matrix [y][x]
        Throws:

        public Color[][] getMatrix(int i)
                    throws L8Exception
        Gets current color Matrix from a L8 connected device given by index.
        Parameters:
        i - L8 index in the connected device list. start from 0 to N.
        Returns:
        Color Matrix.
        Throws:

      • setAnimation

        public void setAnimation(org.json.simple.JSONArray jsonFrames)
                  throws L8Exception
        Sets animation from a jsonArray.
        Parameters:
        jsonFrames - JSONArray with N frames. format exmple:

        [{"duration":"2","image":"#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#000000-#00ffff-#00ffff-#000000-#000000-#000000-#00ffff-#ffffff-#000000-#ffffff-#ffffff-#000000-#ffffff-#000000-#ffffff-#ffffff-#000000-#ffffff-#ffffff-#000000-#ffffff-#000000-#ffffff-#00ffff-#000000-#00ffff-#00ffff-#000000-#000000-#000000-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#00ffff-#ff0000"},{N1},{N2}...,{N}]

        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.

      • setAnimation

        public void setAnimation(L8.Animation animation)
                  throws L8Exception
        Sets animations from Animation. This is the most easy way of setting animations.
        Parameters:
        animation - Animation object.
        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.

      • getConnectionURL

        public java.lang.String getConnectionURL(int i)
                                  throws L8Exception
        Returns a string with URL or Mac from a given L8.
        Parameters:
        i - L8 index in the connected device list. start from 0 to N.
        Returns:
        URL if L8 is a simulator and a Bluetooth mac if is real device.
        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.

      • getConnectionURL

                    int i)
                      throws L8Exception

        Parameters:
        i - L8 index in the connected device list. start from 0 to N.
        listener - Listener that receives URL.
        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.

                  throws L8Exception
        Runs dice app.
        Parameters:
        color - Color of dice.
        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.

      • setL8Brightness

        public void setL8Brightness(int Brightlevel)
                     throws L8Exception
        Sets bright level
        Parameters:
        Brightlevel - The bright level value can be 0 high, 1 medium or 2 low.
        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.

      • onNotification

        public void onNotification(java.lang.String bundle,
                  int eventNotificationID,
                  int categoryNotificationID)
                    throws L8Exception
        Throws:
        L8Exception

      • setText

        public void setText(java.lang.String text,
           int loop,
           Color color,
           int speed)
             throws L8Exception
        Displays text in L8 device.
        Parameters:
        text - Text to display.
        loop - True if text is shown in loop mode
        color - Text color
        speed - Speed of text displacement, can be 0 high , 1 normal or 2 low.
        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.

      • runL8AppLuminosityAndProximity

        public void runL8AppLuminosityAndProximity(int sensor,
                                  Color colorMatrix,
                                  Color colorBackLed,
                                  byte threshold)
                                    throws L8Exception
        Runs proximity and luminosity apps
        Parameters:
        sensor - Selects the sensor type, 0 for proximity sensor and 1 for luminosity sensor.
        colorMatrix - Color Matrix, the color of all L8 leds.
        colorBackLed - Color of back led.
        threshold - Config the threshold, recommend values: 0x32 for proximity and 0x02 for liminosity
        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.

      • runL8AppLights

        public void runL8AppLights(int lightColorMode,
                  int speed,
                  int backLedInverted)
                    throws L8Exception
        Runs light color app
        Parameters:
        lightColorMode - Selects the light color mode: 1 multicolor, 2 tropical, 3 galaxy, 4 aurora.
        speed - Speed of the color sequence in milliseconds.
        backLedInverted - 1 inverted color and 0 normal color.
        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.

      • runL8AppPartyMode

        public void runL8AppPartyMode()
                       throws L8Exception
        Runs party app. This app active color matrix based on noise level.
        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
              throws L8Exception
        Shuts down all L8 devices connected and selected.
        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.

      • setEventListener

        public void setEventListener(L8.OnEventListener listener,
                    int i)
                      throws L8Exception
        Sets a listener that receives event from L8 device.
        Parameters:
        listener - Listener to set.
        i - L8 index in the connected device list. start from 0 to N.
        Throws:
        L8Exception - L8 generic exception.
        See Also:
        L8.OnEventListener

      • requestSimulator

        public void requestSimulator()
        You can request a simulator for test purpose. It is an asynchronous request.

      • getSimulatorLoaded

        public L8 getSimulatorLoaded()
        Returns a loaded simulator.
        Returns:
        L8 simulator.

      • isSimulatorLoaded

        public boolean isSimulatorLoaded()
        Checks if a simulator has been loaded previously.
        Returns:
        true if simulator is loaded and ready to use.

      • getConnectedDevicesCount

        public int getConnectedDevicesCount()
        Returns the number of L8 device connected.
        Returns:
        L8 device connected.
